{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-823DRU |revision=V1.xR |fcc_date=08/28/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |availability=discontinued |type=wireless router |fcc_id=XU8TEW823824 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A; |fla1_brand=Macronix |ram1=256 MiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16HG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TRENDnet823_2.4GHz_XXXX, TRENDnet823_5GHz_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=TRENDnet823_2.4GHz_[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$,,, TRENDnet823_5GHz_[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' }} :{{SupportPage|vendor=TRENDnet|prod=TEW-823DRU}}
Per the FCC test report, it appears this device will be marketed as two different routers... *TEW-823DRU - '''AC1750 Dual Band Wireless Router''' *TEW-824DRU - '''AC1750 Dual Band Wireless Router with StreamBoostâ„¢ Technology'''
"21514D5500A17A1" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the same photos.
Default settings are almost all per the FCC label.
